name: member-card
effect: Provides access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.
short_effect: Allows access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A card needed for entering the inn in
Canalave City. Oddly, the last date
marked on it was 50 years ago.
